roleset.name: express by waving
roleset.note: GESTICULATE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from gesticulate.01-v)

example.name: bottle as expresser
example.text: At once my ears were drowned [*-1] by a flow of what I took [*T*-2]to be Spanish , but -- the driver 's white teeth flashing at me , the road wildly veering beyond his glistening hair , beyond his gesticulating bottle -- it could have been the purest Oxford English [0] I was half hearing [*T*-3] ; ; I would n't have known the difference .
